name: PizzaBoy
description:
Live out your fantasy of delivering pizza as you embark into a strange new world. Meet new friends and deliver pizza to them all.

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Movement
SPACE - Jump
LEFT/RIGHT MOUSE - Fire

A short game created using Unity and DoodleStudio95.

Follow along with more game being created like this over on my twitter

https://twitter.com/KingBit_Patrick
